N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7304.4 - Approval, revocation and renewal of certification

State Regulations
(a) An application shall be approved, and an
operating certificate shall be issued, only when the Commission finds that the
facility meets, and will be operated in accordance with, the requirements of
this Chapter. (b) Certification
shall be granted in writing for a period of not more than two years, and may be
revoked at any time by the Commission if it finds the facility to be unsafe, unsanitary, or in violation of the regulations contained in this

Chapter. (c) At least ninety (90)
days prior to the expiration an operating certificate, the facility shall
refile an application for the renewed issuance of such operating certificate. Any determination by the Commission to renew an operating certificate shall be
made in accordance with subdivision (a) of this section. Notes
